configStructure.name: templateOne
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by a comma. To check many properties of this type, separate actions by semicolon, e.g., write p1,q2;p2,q2 to check properties 1) p1 cannot happen after q1 and 2) p2 cannot happen after q2.

configStructure.name: templateTwo
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by a comma. To check many properties of this type, separate actions by semicolon.

configStructure.name: templateThree
configStructure.displayName: Type 3: If <action> happens, <action> can happen only after <action> happens
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by a comma. To check many properties of this type, separate actions by semicolon.

configStructure.name: templateFour
configStructure.displayName: Type 4: <action> will eventually happen after <action> happens
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by a comma. To check many properties of this type, separate actions by semicolon.
